#summary Recommendations on dcterms:type and basisOfRecord

= Terms =

 * [http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/index.htm#dcterms:type dcterms:type]
 * [http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/basisOfRecord basisOfRecord]


= Recommendations =

For a regular herbarium specimen:
 * dcterms:type = !PhysicalObject
 * basisOfRecord = !PreservedSpecimen

For a physical image or drawing of a specimen:
 * dcterms:type = !StillImage
 * basisOfRecord = !PreservedSpecimen
